title: Case-Based Intensive Course for Strengthening Teaching Competencies in English for Medical Purposes (EMP)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in general English education, but no foundational medical terminology knowledge
context.additional_context: Customized course for general English teachers required to deliver EMP training to medical professionals, where learners have math/management backgrounds but lack EMP expertise

learning_goals: Capable of performing role-playing using 50 essential medical vocabulary and expressions by situation
Acquire skills to analyze and summarize medical documents (diagnosis reports, prescriptions, etc.)
Cultivate the ability to apply learner needs analysis frameworks when designing EMP (English for Medical Purposes) lessons
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
